item.description: Our monthly ethnic dining night goes Brazilian! Join us at 6:30 PM at the Brazil Grill, 1996 Park Street in Hartford. This informal, family restaurant is a traditional Brazilian churrascaria (and way cheaper than the fancy one across town). In addition to a variety of grilled meats, cut to order for you, there is a buffet featuring treats like oxtail stew, fried yucca, baked chicken, baked salmon, and chili with red beans. What makes Brazil Grill unique is the cafeteria style approach ? and you pay for only what you eat, rather than a fixed price. Visit their website at www.brazilgrillhartford.com
item.name: Brazilian Night!
